title: You can now change your Signal phone number without losing chat data
content:
Privacy-focused messaging app Signal is undoubtedly one of the best messaging apps out there and, with its latest update, it’s getting even better. The update introduces a new feature that lets you change the phone number connected to your account without deleting your chat data. The feature is rolling out with the latest update for

The post You can now change your Signal phone number without losing chat data appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Signal now lets you change your phone number while keeping all your chats. Here's how you can change your Signal phone number.
